website_summaries.verdict: This vest is a smart option, whether you are working or working out.
pros: Two reflective stripes run horizontally across this vest
Bright neon color for high visibility
Designed for construction workers, cyclists, runners, and crossing guards
Comes with lifetime money back guarantee

customer_reviews.title: S/M is more like a Large
customer_reviews.text: I bought the small/medium, and wow is this thing big! I'd definitely call it a men's large (would fit over a shirt of a L man, maybe not over a bigger sweatshirt or coat). I also bought the Small /Neiko High Visibility Neon Yellow Zipper Front Safety Vest with 2 Side Pockets, ASIN/ISEA Standard, and it was exactly the size I was looking for my 13 year old skinny & tall son. This vest has velcro closures, and doesn't seem terribly durable, so I wouldn't recommend it for frequent use. However, for the price, it does the job, it's just far larger than what most people would expect for a 'small/medium'.
customer_reviews.author: L. Frazer

customer_reviews.title: Safety reflective Vest
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to ride on my mini scooter. I like being quite visible to car drivers, and I'm that neon blurb on the road. I recommend this to anyone riding a bike, scooter, even a motorcycle. I think all two-wheeled riders should be required to wear highly visible outwear such as this vest. Sturdy for the money too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Helper

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I walk my dog first thing in the morning and my winter coat is dark. This vest is easy to put on and off and fits over all of my winter layers. I feel much more comfortable walking in the dark knowing cars can see my vest.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Carp

customer_reviews.title: Great for walking the dogs in the woods!
customer_reviews.text: This vest is great, it fits over my coat or sweatshirt without bunching up and is great for when walking in the woods. Nice light vest made of good quility materials.
customer_reviews.author: Peter-from-NH

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: It was sold as a large/extra large vest. I wear a 42 suit coat and this was too snug for me in just a tee shirt. I bought this vest for the velcro fastener as my previous vest had one. I thought that it would be better than a zipper.(zippers can and do break) As far as the quality/durablity goes I can't say as I can"t wear it.
customer_reviews.author: An Old Hippy

customer_reviews.title: One size does NOT fit all. This fits small.
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps my understanding of designed to fit L/XL is different than that of the manufacturer. If I had time to return it before I need it I would return it. The package reads "one size fits all" this should NOT be presented as L/XL unless you mean a large child or tween. I wear a medium women's shirt and this is snug. Over heavy clothing it would not close at all.
customer_reviews.author: L. R. Sacks

customer_reviews.title: Fluorescent stuff right here
customer_reviews.text: Do you want to shine bright like a diamond? Well do it at a fraction of the cost. This is blinding. We used it for the wonderful rolling black outs that California experiences every summer. I would walk through our office in this and people actually noticed me for the first time in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Kale

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Safety Vest!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent extremely high-visability vest! And, at a great price! Bought one for my wife so when were out riding the Harley...day or night, we'll be more visible...and tht's the name of the game...Safety! Highly recommend this product and company! Don F. - San Pedro, CA
customer_reviews.author: Don F.

customer_reviews.title: Works great at night
customer_reviews.text: The small size is big for a petite woman but still works for night walking.
customer_reviews.author: Kela

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: It seems as if it would be very effective and would keep you visible in low light situations, but the size was way smaller than expected. Bought this for my father who typically wears an xl and the l/xl was way too small for him.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: This vest is advertised as *ONE SIZE FITS ALL* and it does not do that. I am average size....6' tall and 184lbs and its way too small. Reinforces the ole adage "you get what you pay for*..
customer_reviews.author: donald brown

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: The label says "One size fits all." All? Where? In Munchkin land? If I suck in my 40" waist I can get it on, but only if I'm wearing a t-shirt. No good for an adult with a sweatshirt or jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Dargan

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal But the Vest Might Be Snug
customer_reviews.text: Great deal. Very lightweight material. One caution is this is one size fits all. That means this size fits people of medium build. If you're over 150 lbs, it will be snug. If you're over 175, it won't fit at all. But the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: QuoteNotes

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what was wanted
customer_reviews.text: This vest was purchased for a guy that walks to work at night and it was super appreciated. It fits well over his winter-weight clothing without being uncomfortable. Just as desired. :)
customer_reviews.author: sandyquill

customer_reviews.title: It does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a female so even the small/medium was huge, but I took a 4 inch seam down both sides, easy peasy, and I wear it every morning because I'm out running before the sun comes up.
customer_reviews.author: Wannaberetired

customer_reviews.title: Feel safer in the dark
customer_reviews.text: I ordered small/medium. It fits more like medium/large. I’m afraid during the weather when it’s warm & humid, it will be too warm but I won’t be walking in complete darkness.
customer_reviews.author: Sarasota

customer_reviews.title: Reflective light weight vest
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a very light weight vest for walking later in the evening when it is just starting to get dark. I wanted something light weight and that wasn’t heavy and wouldn’t be hot. This vest is perfect for what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Cash

customer_reviews.title: Not for large men- 39 or 40 inch waist
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality but runs small (not one size fits all- @ least not over man’s jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Searle

customer_reviews.title: Buy a larger size
customer_reviews.text: All though you have a size chart with the order page the product arrives as a one size fits most. The vest is very small and will not fit a larger person.
customer_reviews.author: duffy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not one-size-fits-all
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I ordered 2 of these, one for each of us. It was too small for him and way too big for me. The design is such that it must be worn velcroed shut but there is no way to adjust the fit. Also the material is quite stiff (which is not the case with other high visibility vests I've seen) and not breathable. Will be sending these ones back.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Very worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very light and looks like it’ll light up in light. My dogs have light collars but I’m in a black jacket. I’m glad to have the security
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect biking vest
customer_reviews.text: Use this lightweight vest while riding my electric bike. It is comfortable and gives me the high visibility I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: It is very large on me
customer_reviews.text: I guess it was a value for the price. What can I say. I work with seniors and I am a senior so I use it to help them cross the street. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Lady Leo The Great

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is not as purchased
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an L/XL yet the sizing on the tag says one size fits all. Very tight fitting not recommended if you rely on a safety vest for work.
customer_reviews.author: Sol21

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great for night running and/or delivery for visibility. Order arrived on time and item accurately described. Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya S

customer_reviews.title: Bright
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two for my sis and I to walk at night! Ordered larger to fit over our sweatshirts! We love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: They're bright!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for the kiddos to wear when out walking the dogs at dusk/early evening. They now stick out like a sore thumb as drivers speed by. I love it. They hate it. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: joshua holder

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson to wear when he's walking his dog. For the price it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Wear this for safety.
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a snug fit but I can live with this because I know I am visible when walking the dogs 🐕 in the dark. Inexpensive $, definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: do it myself

customer_reviews.title: As long as your size is not more than "large" - one size all probably works.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect except it is a "one size fits all" and I am not a "one size" girl. :-) I have made a slight modification and it is working wonderfully to keep me visible when walking my dog at night.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda B. Alleman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very reflective, I feel safer walking my dog at night
customer_reviews.author: SPetrone

customer_reviews.title: It is safe, and good for safety
customer_reviews.text: If you need to be seen when you are out and about, this will do it. :)
customer_reviews.author: kimmie glannon

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and very bright.
customer_reviews.text: Have to wear reflective vest while on a scooter for safety. This vest is light and very bright. Good price. Takes up very little space when stored in the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: It's OK, bought 2, we are large and ...
customer_reviews.text: It's OK, bought 2, we are large and it did not close in front. Kinda flimsy. Works OK for walking at night.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Large
customer_reviews.text: Very large and does not stay closed very well due to construction with only velcro closing.
customer_reviews.author: WolfHowl

customer_reviews.title: Not stylish but gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a lightweight vest to wear over clothing for walking the dog. This vest was the perfect choice at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: johng

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: This is not true to size. It. Says one size but Does Not go around my husband who wears a large. I had to send for another style that will fit
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Safety is important
customer_reviews.text: Bought these so we could walk after dark, the visibility of these vests are great
customer_reviews.author: columbia 645

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Not a fashion piece, but cars will be able to see me walking!
customer_reviews.author: Cherie H.

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: Just what o needed to walk on our road at night.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Parr

customer_reviews.title: inexpensive basic safety vests
customer_reviews.text: They serve their purpose as safety vests, and I appreciate the low price.
customer_reviews.author: msg

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I walk my dog late at night. This product is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Beez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value, visable, reliable
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight. Large enough to fit over a coat or jogging attire. Very visible. Excellent value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs a second, larger size. I’m not fat ...
customer_reviews.text: Needs a second , larger size. I’m not fat but this barely fits over a XL WINTER coat.
customer_reviews.author: Beth C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit my needs perfectly but don't like to fill out these things.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Safety first
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gag gift but it is actually great quality
customer_reviews.author: AMM

customer_reviews.title: To be seen
customer_reviews.text: Just wish it had pockets , but for 6 bucks I guess that's asking to much
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality vest
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my coworker who stay snitching LMAO
customer_reviews.author: April May

customer_reviews.title: Safety Reflective Vest
customer_reviews.text: It's a reflective safety vest......I bought it to carry in my car in case I have an emergency stop at night. I hope I don't ever need to use it!!
customer_reviews.author: Country Girl

customer_reviews.title: The striping is nice and big!
customer_reviews.text: Since it’s a gift, I don’t know about the size, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Carol E. Kubiak

customer_reviews.title: Safety
customer_reviews.text: I feel a lot safer walking my dog at night😊
customer_reviews.author: mbalsstra

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as large/ extra large. Received a one size fits all that was far too small. False advertising. Doesn't say much for Amazon's so-called choice, unless it's a choice for best ripoff.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: My primary motivation for purchasing this particular safety vest was price.
customer_reviews.text: I used this only one day for a tour of a railroad repair facility, but it served me well and I will have other such uses for it in the future. It was comfortable, highly visible, and appeared to be made well. Most of all, the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Great Vest!
customer_reviews.text: Very effective vest. Inexpensive and tested with another person to be visible at over 100 yards
customer_reviews.author: Lars S.

customer_reviews.title: Not for the Chubby
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for being out in the predawn gloom when otherwise wearing my black parka. Arrived on time, well made, exactly as described. It's just that, well, over my parka it's a little snug ... but whose fault is that?
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Just what I had in mind but runs big
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a small/medium and it's really big. I'll still be able to use it but I think these are men's sizes.
customer_reviews.author: michaelaivxx

customer_reviews.title: At Least 2 sizes smaller than advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I think the vest would be great working outside in the heat. However, it's sized very wrong. I'm a curvy size 14 woman and I can't get it fastened. I'm not sure what they think L/XL is. It might fit a small. Don't buy it if you wear a regular size L or XL.
customer_reviews.author: Jonnie Nottingham

customer_reviews.title: "one size fits it all"
customer_reviews.text: No, it does not. It is a good buy, but for people with more than 220lbs way too small.
customer_reviews.author: Der Bewerter

customer_reviews.title: Decent item for safety
customer_reviews.text: Fits good and stays on. Purchased for walking my furbaby. Wish it had pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Dave & Angela

customer_reviews.title: easy on, easy off
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and easy to put on and take off. High visibility for night walks.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Highly reflective
customer_reviews.text: Got it for walking my dogs after work. I live in the country and it gets dark early in the winter. It fits well over my coat and is super easy to throw on quickly before walking out. Very cheap and does its job well!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Davis

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job.
customer_reviews.text: Runs really big, but then it fits over s winter coat.
customer_reviews.author: K M

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to store.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to keep handy on a vacation we took in case of car trouble. Did not need it but will keep handy in case of future needs. Looks like it would work well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product but not true to fit
customer_reviews.text: Great color. My only concern is the XL fits more like a large so I’m assuming it runs small. If you need and XL go a size above what you really need. Not a true to fit. Other than that, great price and nice material
customer_reviews.author: JONATHAN WILLIAMS

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. I wear it everyday to work. Good material.
customer_reviews.author: Giseli`

customer_reviews.title: Worked great to keep my traffic crew visible during an evening ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly. Worked great to keep my traffic crew visible during an evening Drive-thru Nativity.
customer_reviews.author: Tillie67

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: The reflector vest exceeded my expectations both in delivery time and quality of product. I will definitely be purchasing from this vendor in the future when I require reflective safety gear.
customer_reviews.author: jim black

customer_reviews.title: great reflective vest
customer_reviews.text: We got this for early morning running and it is perfect. Light weight and reflective. great price.
customer_reviews.author: specialjn

customer_reviews.title: vest too small
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear an xl in everything but this vest does not fit. its too small due to having to wear it over 2 layers of clothing. I really need to go up a size but there is not a bigger size available.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Beckham

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, well stitched, good quality and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: It's very comfortable and well stitched product. Does the job for what it's meant to do. Quality of cloth is superior at perfect price point.
customer_reviews.author: Vijay Thakkar

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so that when I go to work early in the morning, people will be able to see me walk, and I won't get hit by a car.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an XXl. When I got the vests the package says "one size fits most". Ha! that's not true. So very upset. I've had to order 3 different types of vest before I found one that actually was the size I order.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice for walking at night, that’s what I bought them for
customer_reviews.author: Mary  Patina

customer_reviews.title: value purchase
customer_reviews.text: The product was as expected and represented a good value for the purposes of dog-walking at night
customer_reviews.author: william m.

customer_reviews.title: Could probably use an extra piece of Velcro on front but happy with
customer_reviews.text: Very reflective. Could probably use an extra piece of Velcro on front but happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Hey, i’m over here!
customer_reviews.text: Great vest, easily seen , all autos need these inside their cars.
customer_reviews.author: Skidly say yes

customer_reviews.title: Although it is a nice product if it could fit me ☹️
customer_reviews.text: Run small. Could not use/ to small for me. Although it is a nice product if it could fit me ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Peter Jerry Nyznyk

customer_reviews.title: Security and Safety while shedding pounds
customer_reviews.text: The luminescent colors can be seen from a great distance and gives me a feeling of comfort and security on my night runs.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: not OSHA approved but will work for walking along the streets in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B.

customer_reviews.title: SMALL!!!!
customer_reviews.text: One size fits all if you're a medium or smaller...joke
customer_reviews.author: Art C.

customer_reviews.title: It's just okay.
customer_reviews.text: Don't like the velcro closure as well as it runs very small.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn jones

customer_reviews.title: I like the vest it's self however
customer_reviews.text: I like the vest it's self however, the size one size fits all is not accurate it is basically an adult medium
customer_reviews.author: RobN

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, great fit. Overall great item for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good to go
customer_reviews.text: Seems fine. Would have liked the front closure to be a longer velcr, or maybe a few short strips placed more like buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Obrien

customer_reviews.title: Wrong description / size
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Ordered a L/XL and when I got it it was tiny and the tag said "one size fits all". Thanks for nothing!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica D.

customer_reviews.title: Its great
customer_reviews.text: I use it when I go for a walk with my dog at dusk or dawn.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's fine...yay
customer_reviews.text: was more yellow than green as in the photo, no problem
customer_reviews.author: friend in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Received it and wore it immediately to test it out, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Aguiar

customer_reviews.title: A great price for a much safer walk in the dark.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, fits over multiple layers for cold weather walking. Cars give me room to walk now.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Klauer

customer_reviews.title: Tag on package says L/XL but the tag on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Tag on package says L/XL but the tag on the vest itself says one size fits all. WRONG! Maybe for someone from China but an avg size American!
customer_reviews.author: David Sherlund

customer_reviews.title: The one size fits all is not true at all.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing with the statement that one size fits all. That is not true
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described. It was lightweight and fit good. comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Joe Richards

customer_reviews.title: Safety Vest
customer_reviews.text: Great price for school Safety Patrol. Holding up well the first year!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Fredrickson

customer_reviews.title: great vest to wear when walking the dogs when it's ...
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, great vest to wear when walking the dogs when it's dusk or dark outside. Think it was only 1 size and it's big enough to go over a heavier coat, yet loose and cool enough to wear just over a t-shirt. It's all about safety and being seen and I can sure be seen wearing this.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia White

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run very large
customer_reviews.text: This vest is labeled small/medium and its humongous. It's really an extra large
customer_reviews.author: Susan behrens

customer_reviews.title: Size run small
customer_reviews.text: Product says one size fits all. Not true at all.
customer_reviews.author: bryan c.

customer_reviews.title: "One size" only for the very slender
customer_reviews.text: "One size fits all" only very slender people who don't plan to wear a sweater. Quality consistent with price. Seller gave refund even though I had given it to a relative who is very slender. Thus 3 stars. Less two for misleading size. Maybe should have added a star for good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amherst Buyer

customer_reviews.title: As expected.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the parking attendants at our big event.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nuttmann

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Durable material. Very bright. Just what we needed at an excellent price.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits fine. Arrived in good shape. Keeps me visible on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Beck
